intro: Eschscholzia floribunda, commonly known as the California poppy, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It is characterized by its vibrant orange or red flowers and feathery leaves. The plant belongs to the Papaveraceae family, which includes other poppies and related species. Eschscholzia floribunda is an annual herb that thrives in well-drained soils and full sun. It is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
